Hello! I am currently studying to become a licensed therapist, and I can honestly say that therapy isnâ€™t for everyone. A lot of what we do is overstated by the general public and I absolutely agree with you that therapy definitely isnâ€™t the cure for mental illnesses. For many people however, it can be a successful treatment for their specific issue. 

I think that if therapy works for you, great! But if not, that is completely okay too. There are other things besides therapy that can help. 

Stay safe! Stay healthy!
